channel.title: Need help with portfowarding
channel.description:
hello, well, i don't know if its the right section, anyway, sorry if its not, but i need help.
i got a SmartAX MT882 Router and i wanna portfoward it because...
History:
I have had another internet provider that gave a router and i has an excellent no-ip server...but i changed my internet and the provider gave me a ROUTER!
SmartAX MT882 , and...what happened? i put my server on and call people to join...and they can't enter. People say in forums that they have the same problem , and they have "Routers too" so they "portfowarded" his router and now they have a no-ip server back. Please help me to fix this problem! i wanna have my 24/7 server back with no-ip.
My Msn is: [email]faivmu@hotmail.com[/email]
Add me, give me your Msn, or answer me here, please.

item.title: Need help with portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @codyganzell codyganzell
item.description:
@codyganzell wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html
Follow that, should work. You can also go to portforward.com and they explain it there…

Read full topic
